actions.text: Referred jointly to the Committees on Budget; Governmental Affairs pursuant to the order of August 4, 1977 with instructions that if one committee reports, the other Committee has thirty days of continuous session to report or to be discharged.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that the Congressional Budget Office and the Office of Management and Budget provide updated baseline and current service estimates for Fiscal 1987-1991.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the Director of the Congressional Budget Office, in conjunction with the Director of the Office of Management and Budget, shall report revised estimates of total revenues, budget authority, outlays, and the deficit for FY 1987 through 1991 to the Congress by May 16.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that the Congressional Budget Office and the Office of Management and Budget provide updated baseline and current service estimates for Fiscal 1987-1991.
